title: Looking for a Piedmont 350 Young (hand or glove), Cobb bat on, or Matty white cap
author: David R

posts.post_title: Looking for a Piedmont 350 Young (hand or glove), Cobb bat on, or Matty white cap
posts.post_content:
I need one of the above cards with a Piedmont 350 back in 2-4 grade to complete my HOF back run.

I can trade any of these or do a cash deal.  I also have a Matty white cap SGC 30 and Young bare hand SGC 40 (both Piedmont 150s) on eBay under seller Charlie11499 that I could trade too.  

Thanks,
David R
